Title: Object: Papyrus Anastasi 3
Description: Papyrus Anastasi III; sheet 6; Hieratic literary text recto and verso. Late Egyptian Miscellanies. Part of "Commands to make preparation for Pharaoh's arrival". Referred to by Gardiner, Late Egyptian miscellanies p. 33 no. 4, as Pap. Anastasi III A.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: Gardiner, A.H. 1937. Late Egyptian Miscellanies, Brussels, pp.33 Caminos, R.A. 1954. Late Egyptian Miscellanies, Brussels, pp. 117-122
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (372040) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/372040)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus Black ink Red ink Backed: white paper Supported locally: tracing paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: cloth Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair
